    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BukkitBallController createBallController()
      Creates a new ball managing controller for the given plugin. Does not include a listener so the ball does not react to the default events when you add the ball to the default ballcontroller.
      static BallMetaController createBallMetaController()
      Creates a new ball meta managing controller for the given plugin. Can be used to store and retrieve multiple ball meta from files.
      static void disable()
      Disables the api of the given plugin.
      static void initialize()
      Initializes the api with the given plugin. Throws exception if already initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()

        Initializes the api with the given plugin. Throws exception if already initialized.

      • disable

        public static void disable()

        Disables the api of the given plugin.

      • createBallController

        public static BukkitBallController createBallController()

        Creates a new ball managing controller for the given plugin. Does not include a listener so the ball does not react to the default events when you add the ball to the default ballcontroller.

        Returns:
        bukkitBallController

      • createBallMetaController

        public static BallMetaController createBallMetaController()

        Creates a new ball meta managing controller for the given plugin. Can be used to store and retrieve multiple ball meta from files.

        Returns:
        ballMetaController
